name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior QA Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering quality assurance across healthcare and financial applications. Proficient in testing methodologies including manual and automated testing, with a strong background in API testing and adherence to ISTQB standards. Expertise in analysis, reporting, and maintaining comprehensive documentation to ensure system integrity and compliance. Notable experience working collaboratively with cross-functional teams to enhance product quality. 

In addition to quality assurance, I am a Full Stack Developer skilled in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and **Flutter**. I bring hands-on expertise in **React**, **Next.js**, **Vue**, **Node.js**, **FastAPI**, and **Django**, enabling a holistic approach to software development. Experienced in building AI/ML-powered platforms for predictive analytics and real-time processing. Additionally, well-versed in deploying cloud-native systems on **AWS** and **Azure**, implementing microservices, event-driven architectures, and CI/CD pipelines.

experience.responsibilities:
- Defined and enforced robust testing strategies across the stack using **Jest**, **Cypress**, **Postman**, and **PyTest** to ensure comprehensive coverage across unit, integration, E2E, and contract-level tests.
- Utilized **API** testing methodologies to validate functionality and performance based on specifications and business requirements, ensuring alignment with **ISTQB** guidelines.
- Led efforts for implementing automation in testing processes, enhancing efficiency and accuracy, and significantly reducing testing time by **40%**.
- Collaboratively worked with cross-functional teams to develop and maintain documentation, facilitating clear communication regarding testing strategies, results, and defects.
- Conducted detailed analysis of testing results to provide actionable insights and facilitate decision-making for stakeholders, enhancing overall software quality.
- Created and maintained comprehensive test reporting frameworks to track quality benchmarks and project milestones, presenting findings to team members and management.
- Leveraged collaborative tools to streamline testing processes, improving inter-team communication and version control in managing test scripts.
- Ensured rigorous regression testing as part of CI/CD pipelines utilizing technologies such as **GitHub Actions**, reducing defect leakage to **1%** in production.
- Implemented API performance testing tools and strategies to assess response times and reliability, achieving performance benchmarks of under **200 ms** for critical endpoints.

Conduct comprehensive **manual** and **automated testing** of core financial applications and their **APIs** to ensure quality and compliance with specifications.  
Collaborate with cross-functional teams to enhance overall software quality, leveraging **collaborative tools** for effective communication and bug reporting.  
Create detailed **documentation** of test plans, test cases, and reports to facilitate knowledge sharing and improve **analysis** of software performance and issues.  
Develop and execute robust testing strategies that align with **ISTQB** standards, ensuring thorough coverage and risk assessment for each release.  
Utilize industry-leading **testing frameworks** to automate regression tests, reducing testing cycle time by **30%**.  
Analyze testing results and provide actionable insights to development teams to drive product improvements and ensure timely delivery and deployment of software updates.  
Engage in regular **reporting** of testing progress, defects, and resolutions, maintaining transparency with all stakeholders throughout the project lifecycle.

Conducted thorough **API** testing to validate backend service functionalities across **Python** (FastAPI, Django) and **Node.js** (NestJS, Express) frameworks, ensuring the accountability and reliability of systems in a global e-commerce environment.
Executed extensive **manual** and **automation** testing methodologies using tools such as Selenium and Postman, enhancing product quality and adherence to industry standards while achieving a defect identification rate of over **95%** in pre-release evaluations.
Leveraged **ISTQB** certified techniques to develop and refine comprehensive testing documentation, including test plans and detailed reports, facilitating traceability and transparency in testing processes.
Collaborated with development teams using **collaborative tools** like JIRA and Confluence to streamline workflow, prioritize testing based on release cycles, and implement continuous integration testing strategies for real-time feedback.
Performed data analysis for test results, utilizing **reporting** tools to identify trends and evaluate project risks, which led to a **30%** reduction in post-release defects.
Participated in cross-functional teams to analyze requirements, ensuring thorough understanding and coverage of functional and non-functional specifications before project initiation.
Established effective **testing** frameworks for both frontend (React 18, Vue 3, Angular) and backend (MongoDB, PostgreSQL) applications, which improved the speed and efficiency of the testing cycle by **40%**.
Enhanced testing efficiency through the application of automated scripts, reducing regression testing time by **50%** and enabling faster deployment cycles.
Managed documentation of testing processes and outcomes to facilitate knowledge sharing and onboarding of new team members, contributing to a **20%** improvement in team onboarding efficiency.
Actively participated in QA meetings and brainstorming sessions to foster a culture of continuous improvement and innovation in the testing processes.
